name: K. Lost world
description:
K. Lost world, 

check-out the official site of K. Lost world.

is an action RPG where you have the freedom to choose whether to follow the path of truth (breaking the norm) or follow the path of illusion (play it in a conventional way). The game always wants to convince you that this program is real but it will also have algorithms trying to warn you and get you out of this lie but it's up to you (player) to want to choose which side you will follow. As much as we want you to follow the truth, the choice is yours anyway. > > > > > > Available on 11/06/22. > > kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk kkkk
